name: popotojs
description: Graph based search interface for Neo4j database.

scripts.build: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && json2module package.json > dist/package.js && node rollup.node && rollup -c && npm run uglify
scripts.uglify: uglifyjs -b beautify=false dist/popoto.js -c negate_iife=false -m -o dist/popoto.min.js && uglifycss css/popoto.css css/popoto-svg.css --output dist/popoto.min.css
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run uglify && cp -r css/font dist/font
